markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Snake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1918)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

At around 5 feet long, this massive, rotting serpent lacks potent venom, but its bite still injects putrid fluid that can cause infection.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Zombie Snake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1918)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 170</row>

**Perception** +2; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie snake is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 35
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +7,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing plus filth fever

**Filth Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) The [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions from filth fever can't end or be reduced until the disease is cured; **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1d4 hours); **Stage 2** sickened 1 (1 day); **Stage 3** sickened 1 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 day); **Stage 4** unconscious (1 day); **Stage 5** dead

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />
name: Zombie Snake

</summary>
